contentList.content: This creature has resistance to all damage until the start of its next turn.
This character is able to add its Wisdom modifier for Melee and Ranged weapon attacks, and deals an additional 1d4 Force damage.
This weapon is magically sharpened.
This weapon is covered in magical vibrations.
You have advantage on attack rolls while using this weapon.
This weapon is covered in magical electricity.
This weapon may heal [1] instead of damage.
This weapon is covered in magical fire.
A protective layer of fire weather's this creature's body, giving off light, providing Fire resistance, and lashing out at attackers.
A protective layer of frost weather's this creature's body, protecting your body and providing Cold resistance.
Snapping sparks surround this creature's body for the duration, giving light, and providing with Resistance to Lightning damage.
Freshly Bathed
This creature has advantage on Charisma checks.
This Creature has resistance to Force Damage and is safe from Magic Missile. They also gain 1d4 to all Saving throws.
Misdirected Mark (Owner)
This creature believes another has attacked it. It has disadvantage on attack rolls against all other targets.
He Did It!
This creature is believed to have harmed another.
Muffled
Sounds emanating from this creature are difficult to hear. This creature has advantage on Stealth and Slight of Hand rolls.
Thundering Armor
This creature's armor is pulsing with magical energy, increasing its AC by +2, and giving it resistance to Force damage.
Glamoured
Due to a spell, this creature looks unnaturally beautiful, and has advantage on Charisma checks.
Seeking Warmth
The only thing on your mind is getting warmer. Some things may slip your perception.
A magical light follows your every move.
